statements: UPDATE project_progress SET progress_status='In Progress' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE project_progress SET design_iteration=2, progress_status='Completed' WHERE project_id = 2;
UPDATE project_progress SET progress_status = 'Completed' WHERE project_id = 101 AND student_id = 201 AND design_iteration = 3 AND group_id = 1;
UPDATE project_progress SET project_name = 'Improved Design', progress_status = 'In Progress' WHERE student_id = 202 AND design_iteration = 4 AND group_id = 2;
UPDATE group_projects SET project_name = 'New Project Name', project_description = 'Updated project info' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE design_iterations SET iteration_number = 2, iteration_description = 'Second iteration' WHERE iteration_id = 3;
UPDATE group_projects SET project_name='New Project Name', project_description='Updated Project Description' WHERE project_id=1;
UPDATE design_iterations SET iteration_number=2, iteration_notes='Completed iteration 2 successfully' WHERE project_id=1 AND iteration_id=3;
UPDATE projects SET project_name = 'New Project Name', start_date = '2022-06-01' WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE student_progress SET progress_description = 'Completed the task successfully', progress_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE progress_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614176000';
UPDATE projects SET project_name = 'New Project Name 1', project_description = 'Updated description' WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE design_iterations SET design_notes = 'Design notes updated', timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE iteration_id = '222e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE Projects SET project_description = 'New description' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE Teams SET team_lead_id = 5 WHERE team_id = 2;

UPDATE Teams SET team_lead_id = 3, project_id = 2 WHERE team_id = 1
